metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30846 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in iOS 14.8 and iPadOS 14.8, Safari 15, tvOS 15, iOS 15 and iPadOS 15, watchOS 8. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-30846` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.34.0-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.34.0-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.34.0-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.34.0-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.34.0-1ubuntu1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.34.0-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8 mdeslaur> webkit2gtk no longer builds on bionic's toolchain

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.34.0-1ubuntu1').
wpewebkit package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
